body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Insurance. My name is Andrew Walker and I'm here to assist you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Andrew, my name is Rachel Bennett.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rachel. Can you please provide me with your date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is the first of April, nineteen eighty-seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rachel. Last security question, can you confirm the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits of my social security number are two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Rachel. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today regarding our services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling happy today, Andrew. Just wanted to check on the status of my recent claim.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Rachel. Let me look into that for you. Thank you for your time and patience. I will get back to you shortly with an update.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Rachel. Have a wonderful day ahead! Goodbye.
